message: Congratulations on considering our top-of-the-line product! With over 50% of our products being high-quality, the chances are high that this one is a winner. We're confident that you'll love it. Are you ready to take the plunge and experience the best?

However, we want to be transparent with you - we've had a slight issue with one of our recent batches, and we're taking steps to rectify the matter. But don't worry, we're committed to providing the best possible experience for our customers. Would you like to take a chance on our product and be one of the first to experience our improved quality?
I'm willing to take the chance and support your commitment to quality improvement.
